root.name: Gravity Wars
root.description: OverviewAn Amiga port of the PC version was particularly successful as a shareware title. The player's enjoyment is derived from the skill required to achieve a successful hit and the surprising orbits resulting from shots that can result in unexpected own goals.The game has inspired many recent clones, for example there is an online java version: Death Star Battles: www.deathstarbattles.co.uk and "Mammoth Gravity Battles" a version that takes the concept into 3D: www.mammothgravitybattles.com
